title: Just looking for new friends to play with!
body:
Hey there!

Myself and a friend are looking for new people to play with, we're both over 20 and mostly just play Draft Pick. However, we also play all the game modes that come out and from time to time the occasional ranked game is fine too, flex included.

We really wanna meet some friendly, chill people who enjoy some banter here and there.

If this sounds like you, add me on league @Istehz
